participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and ambitious, loves music and enjoys socializing.
participant_1.background: I am dating my boss. I am in my 20s. I work at a real estate office. My favorite flower is a daisy. I love to sing.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and energetic, enjoys community service and outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: I work at a non-profit that helps children. I love going to concerts and dancing hard. I am allergic to shellfish. My favorite food is cheese. I like horseback riding.

content.text: Hi there! What do you do for work?
I work at a non-profit that helps children.
Oh, that's great! What do you do there?
I do a lot of different things, but mostly I work on fundraising and marketing.
It is! I love helping kids and I'm really passionate about my work.
That's awesome! What's your favorite thing about your job?
My favorite thing is getting to see the impact that we're having on kids' lives.
It is! It's the best feeling in the world knowing that you're making a difference.
That's great! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love going to concerts and dancing hard. I'm also allergic to shellfish, so I love cheese.
Oh, that's cool! I love going to concerts too. I'm not allergic to anything, so I can eat whatever I want.
That's good! I wish I could eat everything.
Well, you could always try some of my cheese. I have a lot of different types.
That would be great! I love trying new things.
Great! I'll bring some over next time we hang out.
